text: Pandit Shivkumar Sharma (13 January 1938 â€“ 10 May 2022) was an Indian composer and santoor player. He was born in Jammu, Jammu and Kashmir, British Raj. His career began in 1955. Some of the movies he composed music for were musical hits, such as Faasle (1985), Chandni (1989), Lamhe (1991), and Darr (1993). Sharma died from cardiac arrest in Jammu on 10 May 2022, aged 84. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indian composers Category:Indian musicians Category:People from Jammu and Kashmir Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest
title: Shivkumar Sharma
